UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Octopromycin: Antibacterial and antibiofilm functions of a novel peptide derived from Octopus minor against multidrug-resistant Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Rajapaksha DC, Jayathilaka EHTT, Edirisinghe SL, Nikapitiya C, Lee J, Whang I, De Zoysa M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:12.5% Cytotoxicity=400 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=300 µg/ml,Zebrafish embryos:0% Killing=0.25 µg/ml,Zebrafish embryos:100% Killing=8 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=50µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MBC=200µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(20-30% Cytotoxicity=400µg/ml)
